text: Major-General Henry Lee III (January 29, 1756 â€“ March 25, 1818) was an early American patriot and politician. He was a cavalry officer in the Continental Army during the American Revolution. His nickname was Light-Horse Harry. He married Anne Hill Carter Lee. They had seven children. The most notable was Robert E. Lee. Henry Lee III died in 1818. == References == Category:1756 births Category:1818 deaths Category:American Revolutionary War Category:American generals Category:Congressional Gold Medal recipients Category:Freemasons Category:Governors of Virginia Category:Politicians from Alexandria, Virginia Category:Princeton University alumni Category:United States representatives from Virginia Category:Military people from Virginia
title: Henry Lee III
